snippet: A debut from Tom Pepper in which he tells us how to proceed.
abstract: A debut from Tom Pepper in which he tells us how to proceed.
lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE- The last thing you want on a Monday is to have someone telling you where to GO, much less telling you all the possible ways you can get there. Fortunately for us, we have a debut from Tom Pepper that makes the journey light and fun.
